mapper.select: select item_idx ,expert_idx ,photo_idx ,item_name ,item_content ,item_date from (select ROWNUM rn, board.* from(select ,item_idx ,expert_idx ,photo_idx ,item_name ,item_content ,item_date from item order by item_idx) board) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow} and item_status=1 and expert_idx=#{expertIdx}
